title: Jossimar Sanchez
text:
Jossimar Israel Sanchez (born September 4, 1991) is a <a href="Dominican%20Americans">Dominican American</a> <a href="association%20football">soccer</a> player.
Career.
Sanchez played four years of <a href="college%20soccer">college soccer</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Connecticut">University of Connecticut</a> between 2009 and 2012. While at college, Sanchez also appeared for <a href="USL%20PDL">USL PDL</a> side <a href="Central%20Jersey%20Spartans">Central Jersey Spartans</a> in 2011.
On January 22, 2013 Sanchez was selected 4th in the <a href="2013%20MLS%20Supplemental%20Draft">2013 MLS Supplemental Draft</a> by <a href="New%20England%20Revolution">New England Revolution</a>, and was signed over a year later on February 24, 2014. He was later loaned out to New England's <a href="USL%20Pro">USL Pro</a> affiliate <a href="Rochester%20Rhinos">Rochester Rhinos</a>. On December 8, 2014 the <a href="New%20England%20Revolution">New England Revolution</a> declined his contract option.
